message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $100.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. $100 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $75 for it.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can do $90, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $90 is still a bit too high for me. How about $85? That's a fair price for both of us.
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $87.50. That's the lowest I can go.
Alice, I really appreciate your effort, but $87.50 is still a little more than I'm comfortable spending. How about we settle at $86? It's a good deal for both of us.
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession at $88, but that's as low as I can go.
